- Confirmed GRIB2 files contain valid pollutant data (PMTF=PM2.5, PMTC=PM10)

The collection system now successfully:
- Downloads real GEFS-Aerosol GRIB2 files from NOAA
- Handles bbox arguments with negative coordinates properly

- Supports global coverage with bbox="-180,-60,180,85"
